snippet: It has not taken long for the Razorbacks’ new coach, Bret Bielema, to willingly make waves in a way his predecessor unsuccessfully tried to avoid.
lead_paragraph: It has not taken long for the Razorbacks’ new coach, Bret Bielema, to willingly make waves in a way his predecessor unsuccessfully tried to avoid.

headline.main: Arkansas Coach Jealously Guards His Outspokenness
headline.print_headline: Arkansas Coach Embraces Spotlight And Makes Waves
